name: Invasion at Camp Shoomup
description:
INVASION AT CAMP SHOOMUP 

Is a little arcade game about surviving never ending waves of zombies and aliens. 

Collect weapons, place turrets, and rack up as many kills as possible.

Controls --

WASD - Movement

E - Your wrench, used to place turrets

Mouse - Aim and shoot

Number Keys - Change weapons

Unlock new weapons by finding them around the map, then see how long you can hold out.

(Any feedback is really appreciated, I'd also love to know what your scores are!)
